FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

q1.question: How do I start earning with Shortlinkmu?
q1.answer: Simply create a free account, paste your long URLs, and share the shortened links. You earn money every time someone clicks your link based on our competitive CPM rates.

q2.question: What is CPM and how does it work?
q2.answer: CPM (Cost Per Mille) is the amount you earn per 1,000 views. Our rates range from $1-$12 depending on traffic quality and visitor location. Tier 1 countries like US, UK, and Canada earn the highest rates.

q3.question: What is the minimum payout amount?
q3.answer: Our minimum payout is just $2, making it easy to withdraw your earnings quickly. We support PayPal, Bank Transfer, Dana, OVO, and cryptocurrency withdrawals.

q4.question: Can I customize my short links?
q4.answer: Yes! You can create custom aliases, add password protection, set expiry dates, and choose ad levels. Premium members get access to even more customization options.

q5.question: How does the referral program work?
q5.answer: Share your unique referral link and earn 10-25% lifetime commission from your referrals' earnings. The more active referrals you have, the higher your commission rate.

q6.question: How fast are payouts processed?
q6.answer: Payouts are typically processed within 1-7 business days. We support multiple payment methods including PayPal, bank transfers, e-wallets, and cryptocurrency.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Shortlinkmu ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use the Service. These terms apply to all users, including visitors, registered users, and publishers.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content: To use our Service, you must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent. By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms.

account.title: 3. Account Registration
account.content: When you create an account, you agree to:
list: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain the security of your password and account
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
account.note: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

service.title: 4. Service Description
service.content: Shortlinkmu provides URL shortening services that allow users to create shortened links and earn revenue based on legitimate visitor traffic. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the Service at any time without prior notice.

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You agree not to use the Service for:
list: Creating links to illegal, harmful, or malicious content
Distributing malware, viruses, or phishing schemes
Generating fraudulent or artificial traffic (bots, auto-clicks)
Promoting violence, hate speech, or discriminatory content
Infringing on intellectual property rights
Spamming or unsolicited bulk messaging
Any activity that violates applicable laws or regulations
prohibited.note: Violation of these rules may result in immediate account termination and forfeiture of earnings.

earnings.title: 6. Earnings and Payments
earnings.content: Publishers earn revenue based on legitimate views of their shortened links. Payment terms:
list: Earnings are calculated based on our published CPM rates
Rates may vary based on traffic location and quality
Minimum payout thresholds apply as specified on our platform
We reserve the right to withhold payment for suspicious activity
Earnings from fraudulent traffic will be forfeited

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property related to the Service are owned by Shortlinkmu. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission. You retain ownership of content you share through our Service.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. We disclaim all warranties including merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Shortlinkmu shall not be liable for:
list: Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Loss of profits, revenue, data, or business opportunities
Service interruptions or system failures
Actions of third parties using the Service
Damages exceeding the amount paid to you in the past 12 months

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Shortlinkmu, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the Service, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any rights of another party.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. Provisions that by their nature should survive termination shall survive.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes by posting the updated Terms on this page. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

governing.title: 13. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Indonesia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Jakarta, Indonesia.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact page or email us at legal@shortlinkmu.com.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information to provide and improve our services. The types of information we collect include:

personal.title: Personal Information
items: Email address and username during registration
Profile information you choose to provide

usage.title: Usage Data
items: IP addresses of visitors clicking your links
Browser type, device information, and operating system
Pages visited, time spent, and referral sources
Click patterns and geographic location data

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
list: To provide, operate, and maintain our URL shortening service
To process your account registration and authenticate users
To calculate and process your earnings and payouts
To send you service updates, security alerts, and support messages
To detect, prevent, and address fraud, abuse, and technical issues
To analyze usage patterns and improve our services
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:
list: With payment processors to facilitate withdrawals
With service providers who assist in operating our platform
When required by law or to respond to legal process
To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
sharing.note: Third-party service providers are contractually bound to protect your data.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
list: Essential cookies for authentication and security
Analytics cookies to understand how users interact with our service
Preference cookies to remember your settings
cookies.note: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect functionality.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
list: Encryption of data in transit using SSL/TLS
Secure storage of passwords using hashing algorithms
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Access controls limiting who can view your data
security.note: While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Specifically:
list: Account data is retained while your account is active
Usage and analytics data is retained for up to 24 months
Financial records are retained as required by law
You may request deletion of your account and associated data

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
list: Access and obtain a copy of your personal data
Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your personal data
Object to or restrict certain processing activities
Data portability to receive your data in a structured format
Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
rights.note: To exercise these rights, please contact us through our contact page.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. By using our service, you consent to such transfers. We take appropriate safeguards to ensure your data remains protected.

thirdparty.title: 10. Third-Party Links
thirdparty.content: Our service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit through shortened links.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@shortlinkmu.com or through our contact page.

ReportAbuse.subtitle: Found a suspicious or harmful link? Report it here and help us keep the platform safe.

howWeHandle.title: How We Handle Reports
items: You'll be contacted if more info is needed

form.title: Submit a Report

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.subtitle: Sign up for free and start monetizing your links today.

sections.heading: What is a Shortlink and How Does It Work?
paragraphs: A shortlink is a service that shortens long URLs into compact, easily shareable links. Behind this simplicity lies a monetization model that allows publishers to earn money every time someone clicks their link.

The process is simple: you register on a platform like Shortlinkmu, shorten any link, and share it. Every time a visitor clicks your link, they see a brief ad before being redirected to the destination. You get paid based on the number of ad impressions (CPM).

sections.heading: Step 1: Create Your Shortlinkmu Account
paragraphs: Visit shortlinkmu.com and click 'Sign Up Free'. Registration is quick â€” you only need an email, username, and password. After email verification, your account is instantly active.
Make sure to use an active email address as all payment notifications and important updates will be sent there.

sections.heading: Step 2: Shorten Your First Link
paragraphs: After logging in, go to your dashboard and use the 'Create New Link' feature. Paste the URL you want to shorten â€” it can be an article, YouTube video, file download, or anything.
You can also create a custom alias to make your link look more professional, for example shortlinkmu.com/finance-tips.

sections.heading: Step 3: Share and Earn Money
paragraphs: Share your shortlinks across multiple platforms: WhatsApp groups, Telegram, forums, YouTube comments, Instagram bio, or Twitter threads. The more clicks you get, the more you earn.
Important tip: focus on valuable content. Don't spam â€” share links that are genuinely useful to your audience. This builds trust and increases long-term engagement.

sections.heading: Tips to Maximize Your Earnings
paragraphs: Target audiences from high-CPM countries like the United States ($8â€“$15 CPM) and Europe. Create content in English to reach the global market.
Use Shortlinkmu analytics to monitor link performance. Learn the best posting times, which platforms generate the most revenue, and what type of content gets the most clicks.
Consistency is key. Top publishers on Shortlinkmu earn $300â€“$1000 per month by sharing 5â€“10 quality links every day.

sections.heading: Understanding CPM (Cost Per Mille)
paragraphs: CPM stands for Cost Per Mille, meaning cost per thousand ad impressions. In the context of shortlinks, CPM determines how much you get paid for every 1,000 times a visitor views an ad through your link.
For example, if the CPM for Indonesia is $2, that means you earn $2 for every 1,000 clicks from Indonesian visitors.

sections.heading: Factors That Affect CPM
paragraphs: Geographic location of visitors is the biggest factor. Traffic from the US, UK, and European countries has the highest CPM ($5â€“$15), while Southeast Asian traffic is typically $1â€“$3.
Other factors include device type (desktop is usually higher than mobile), visit timing (business hours tend to be higher), and traffic quality (organic visitors vs. bots).

sections.heading: How to Calculate Your CPM Earnings
paragraphs: Simple formula: Earnings = (Number of Clicks / 1,000) Ã— CPM Rate. So if you get 10,000 clicks from the US with a CPM of $8, your earnings = (10,000 / 1,000) Ã— $8 = $80.
On Shortlinkmu, you can view the latest CPM rates for 35+ countries on the Payout Rates page. Rates are updated regularly to reflect ad market conditions.

sections.heading: Strategies for Getting High-CPM Traffic
paragraphs: Create content in English to attract visitors from high-CPM countries. Product reviews, tech tutorials, and finance tips are very popular in global markets.
Leverage platforms like Reddit, Quora, and international forums to reach a global audience. Make sure your content provides real value so it's not considered spam.

sections.heading: 1. Choose the Right Niche
paragraphs: Focus on high-demand niches: technology, finance, gaming, and entertainment are the niches with the most traffic. Consistency in one niche builds a loyal audience.
Research popular keywords using Google Trends to find trending topics. Create relevant content and include your shortlinks naturally.

sections.heading: 2. Diversify Your Platforms
paragraphs: Don't rely on just one platform. Spread your content across WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, and YouTube. Each platform has different audience characteristics.
Create content suited to each platform's format: short videos for TikTok, threads for Twitter, and long-form posts for Facebook Groups.

sections.heading: 3. Use Analytics for Optimization
paragraphs: Shortlinkmu's dashboard provides real-time data on clicks, visitor locations, and performance per link. Use this data to identify what works and what doesn't.
A/B test your link titles and descriptions. Sometimes small copywriting changes can increase CTR (Click-Through Rate) by 2-3x.

sections.heading: 4. Strategic Posting Times
paragraphs: Post during prime time when your target audience is most active. For Indonesian audiences, 7-9 AM and 7-10 PM are the best times.
For global audiences, adjust to high-CPM country timezones â€” post at 8-10 AM EST to reach American audiences.

sections.heading: 5. Build Long-Term Assets
paragraphs: Create a blog, YouTube channel, or social media accounts that generate organic traffic. This is more sustainable than spamming links everywhere.
Evergreen content (always relevant) like tutorials and guides will continue generating clicks and revenue months after being published.

sections.heading: Why SEO Matters for Shortlink Publishers
paragraphs: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) helps your content get found by people searching for information on Google. Organic traffic from search engines is high-quality, free, and sustainable.
Shortlink publishers who understand SEO can get thousands of clicks per day without constantly promoting links manually.

sections.heading: Effective Keyword Research
paragraphs: Use free tools like Google Keyword Planner, Ubersuggest, or Google Trends to find keywords with high search volume but low competition.
Focus on long-tail keywords (3-5 word phrases) that are more specific. For example, 'how to download TikTok videos without watermark' is easier to rank than just 'download video'.

sections.heading: On-Page Optimization
paragraphs: Make sure your title, meta description, and headings contain your target keyword. But keep it natural â€” Google is increasingly smart at detecting keyword stuffing.
Create comprehensive content that fully answers user questions. Google prioritizes content that provides the best user experience.

sections.heading: Link and Anchor Text Optimization
paragraphs: Use descriptive anchor text when inserting shortlinks. Avoid generic anchor text like 'click here'. Instead, use text that describes what the visitor will find.
Place shortlinks naturally within your content. Links relevant to the article context will generate higher CTR than forced links.

sections.heading: Building Quality Backlinks
paragraphs: Backlinks from quality websites help increase your domain authority. Guest posting, content collaboration, and forum contributions are effective ways to build backlinks.
Focus on quality, not quantity. One backlink from an authoritative website is worth more than 100 backlinks from spam sites.

sections.heading: Why Social Media is Ideal for Shortlinks
paragraphs: Social media platforms have billions of active users constantly seeking interesting content. With the right strategy, you can reach thousands to millions of people and convert them into money-generating clicks.
The main advantage of social media is virality â€” one great piece of content can be shared repeatedly, generating exponential clicks without additional effort.

sections.heading: Instagram Strategy
paragraphs: Use your bio link to direct followers to your shortlinks. Create engaging carousel content or Reels and direct viewers to 'link in bio' for more information.
Leverage Instagram Stories with the link sticker feature to directly embed shortlinks. Create story highlights with collections of useful content and related links.

sections.heading: TikTok Strategy
paragraphs: TikTok is the biggest traffic machine right now. Create short informative videos and direct viewers to the link in bio. Use trending sounds and popular hashtags to increase reach.
'Quick tutorials' and 'easy how-to' content perform extremely well on TikTok. End your video with a clear CTA: 'Link in bio for the full guide!'

sections.heading: YouTube Strategy
paragraphs: Embed shortlinks in video descriptions and pinned comments. Create video content that provides value and naturally directs viewers to related links.
YouTube Shorts can also be a huge traffic source. Create short versions of your main content and direct to links in comments or channel description.

sections.heading: Telegram and WhatsApp Strategy
paragraphs: Create a Telegram channel with a specific niche and share quality content regularly. Include relevant shortlinks with every post.
On WhatsApp, leverage groups and status to share links. Make sure your content is valuable so you don't get removed from groups â€” quality always matters more than quantity.

sections.heading: Real-Time Statistics
paragraphs: You can now monitor link performance in real-time directly from your dashboard. Click data, visitor locations, and earnings update every second without needing to refresh.
This feature allows you to make faster decisions about your promotion strategy and identify which links generate the most revenue.

sections.heading: Custom Alias
paragraphs: The custom alias feature has been upgraded! You can now create shortlinks with longer custom names and support for special characters.
Links with custom aliases look more professional and increase visitor trust. Example: shortlinkmu.com/special-promo is much more appealing than a random code.

sections.heading: Increased CPM Rates for Asia
paragraphs: Great news! CPM rates for the Asian region have increased significantly. Indonesia is up 15%, India up 20%, and Philippines up 18% compared to last month.
This increase aligns with the growing digital advertising market in Asia and our new partnerships with premium ad networks.

sections.heading: Faster Withdrawals
paragraphs: Minimum withdrawal remains low and the process is now faster. Funds reach your account within 1-3 business days via bank transfer, PayPal, or cryptocurrency.
We've also added support for new payment methods including DANA and GoPay for the convenience of Indonesian publishers.
